What companies are still hiring during COVID-19 lockdown? In the US: go to your favorite search engine. Type the following, and add your ZIP code. essential business hiring This should bring up a list. Many states have specific sits run by the state government featuring employers who are hiring. And these aren’t just service jobs, either.
